To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RateOfChangeRatio _rocr;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rocr = ROCR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rocr.IsReady)
{
    var period = _rocr.Period.Value;
    var current = _rocr.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rocr = self.ROCR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rocr.IsReady:
    period = self.rocr.Period.Value
    current = self.rocr.Current.Value
